EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.Apache Geode 8-14-18
EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t Miss The Apache Geode™ Summit at SpringOne Platform! [Special Discount Inside]
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> Join us at the Apache Geode™ Summit <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/geode?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-2018]]>, part of SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-2018]]>, this September 24th, in Washington D.C. This year’s agenda is even larger and more comprehensive than last year --- showcasing the latest Geode case studies and tech features. During the last 9 months since our last Geode Summit, the Geode project has had 3 releases, 55 contributors, 1300 code commits and the resolution of over 1400 JIRA tickets. For 2017, Geode was the fifth most active mailing list <[[https://blogs.apache.org/foundation/entry/apache-in-2017-by-the]]>. These are good indicators of the brisk and sustained pace of the project. We’re eager to see you at this year’s Apache Geode™ Summit. See the full agenda and listing here <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/geode?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-2018]]> of Geode sessions at the conference. Use special discount code Attendee_Geode_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register/registration/select?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-2018]]> for $100 off the price of your SpringOne Platform conference pass! We look forward to seeing you in September! The SpringOne Platform Team ***Please note that Geode sessions start on Monday, Sept 24th at 1:00pm, a day before the opening of the main conference. You must register for SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-2018]]> to attend the Apache Geode™ Summit. You'll be able to add Geode sessions to your online schedule maker once the conference app is available nearing the start of the conference.
